Subskills.name: Enlargening Earthquake
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of fissures. Increase the size but decrease the damage dealt.

Subskills.name: Debilitating Burst
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to stun enemies.

Subskills.name: Trembling Pull
Subskills.description: Fissures have a chance to knock monsters towards the center on each hit.

Subskills.name: Earth Crack
Subskills.description: Chance to crack the earth impaling monsters with a stone pillar on hit dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Comet Fall
Subskills.description: Chance to drop a comet on hit dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Natural Disaster
Subskills.description: Increases the proc chance of earth crack and comet fall inflicting arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: Field of Landmass
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect of fissures.

Subskills.name: Rumbling Impact
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Frequent Shaking
Subskills.description: Increases the tick frequency of fissures.

Subskills.name: Electrocharged Fissures
Subskills.description: Inflicts stasis and has a chance to strike monsters with bolts of lightning on hit.

Subskills.name: Manual Quake
Subskills.description: Fissures now unleashes only a single tremble dealing increased damage. Fissures no longer has a cooldown.
